name: ALEXA QUEEN
description: Alexa Queen Fully customized by Cyberxkid.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: show bot number last seen as online

OWNER.description: Please enter the owner number here

BOTNAME.description: Put a Whatsapp bot name here(2022)

STICKER_PACKNAME.description: sticker pack info for the bot

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku app name, same as above entered

RMBG_KEY.description: API key from remove.bg, required for plugin rmbg

LANGUAG.description: Default Language for tts or trt

WARN_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of wanings to a person.

FORCE_LOGOUT.description: In Some scenario have to logout web, Only such case make this true and back to false after logout.

DISABLE_BOT.description: Example : jid,jid,... where bot not works in both ways.

ANTILINK_MSG.description: Message send when antilink and action is kick.
